banner.title1: The platform that helps not to forget about
banner.subtitle: Fatodo is a free web, iOS and Android application that allows you to organize tasks and collaborate on them with your friends and teams

description.paragraph1: With Fatodo, a task management and collaboration app, you can easily keep track of tasks, schedule appointments, and stay sync with friends and colleagues to get things done faster. It's easy to exchange ideas and find the most effective ways to achieve your goals.
description.bullet1: Stay on top of your todo list with Fatodo's customizable task management system!
description.bullet2: Stay connected with your friends and colleagues through Fatodo's built-in chat and messaging features!
description.bullet3: Collaborate with others and share tasks with Fatodo's team management tools!
description.paragraph2: So why wait? Download Fatodo today and start taking control of your life!

members.title: Like a social network but for achieving goals
members.text: Create task lists, share them, and discuss their fulfillment in comments and chat rooms

alarm.title: Set priorities and do not forget about anything
alarm.text: A convenient alert system with e-mail and push notifications will remind you of important dates and events

groups.item1: Create task lists for yourself and plan your day as efficiently as possible
groups.item2: Share tasks and do them faster together with friends and colleagues
groups.item3: Exchange ideas in comments and messages, find effective ways to achieve your goals

calendar.item1: It was never so easily to handle task lists
calendar.item3: Control the execution using the reminder system
calendar.item4: The most important will always remain before your eyes
